SEARCH
Package wsp

Class Teacher

java.lang.Object
wsp.User
wsp.Employee
wsp.Teacher
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Dean
public class Teacher extends Employee implements Serializable
The Teacher class represents a teacher in the system. Teachers are associated with a specific faculty and can teach multiple courses. They can also conduct lessons and provide marks to students.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Teacher

      public Teacher(String username, String password, String firstName, String lastName, TeacherTitle typeTeacher, Faculty faculty)
      Constructs a Teacher object with the specified attributes. if the created teacher is a professor, then a researcher is automatically added.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the teacher.
      password - The password of the teacher.
      firstName - The first name of the teacher.
      lastName - The last name of the teacher.
      typeTeacher - The title of the teacher (e.g., TUTOR, PROFESSOR).
      faculty - The faculty to which the teacher belongs.

    • getCourses

      public Vector<Course> getCourses()
      Gets the courses taught by the teacher.
      Returns:

    • getFaculty

      public Faculty getFaculty()
      Gets the faculty to which the teacher belongs.
      Returns:
      The faculty of the teacher.

    • getLessons

      public Map<Course,Vector<Lesson>> getLessons()
      Gets the lessons conducted by the teacher for each course.
      Returns:
      A map where each course is associated with a vector of lessons.

    • viewMarks

      public void viewMarks(Course selectedCourse)
      Displays the marks for a specific course taught by the teacher.
      Parameters:
      selectedCourse - The course for which to display the marks.

    • putMarks

      public void putMarks()
      Allows the teacher to input marks for students in a specific course.

    • viewMenu

      public void viewMenu()
      Displays the teacher's menu, allowing them to perform various actions such as viewing courses, students, marks, putting marks, viewing rate, viewing news, sending orders and requests, viewing papers, and exiting. If the teacher is also a researcher, an additional option to view the researcher menu is available.
      Overrides:
      viewMenu in class Employee

    • viewRate

      public void viewRate()
      Displays the teacher's rating.
